about_the_game:
Pencilvania is an Exploration game


If you like to explore an unknown world and find hidden secrets, solve puzzles and other interesting sorts of mistery, this is the game for you. But this time, you will embark an adventure of a pen, whose name is Pena.

Never run out of Ink!


Pena moves likes no one, but as any other pen, he's filled with ink. Your moves as Pena are limited to how much ink you have, and you're soon running out of it, you must find the next charger, otherwise you're back to previous stage.

Puzzles, Secrets and Collecting Feathers


Playing as Pena, you're going to face a series of puzzles and obstacles. Collect feathers, the key to unlock the Great Magic Topper's power, by solving mysteries and discovering secrets. Each feather brings Pena closer to the dream of flight, and each challenge brings you closer to understanding the mechanics of the game and the story.

Explore Different Areas


As you collect Feathers, you will be able to unlock the gates to the next area, where you could find a swamp, a desert or another type of environment. There you're going to find more mechanics and skills to embrace, and more secrets to solve.

Pena's Adventure


This is the enchanting journey of Pena, a brave pen who's going to explore the land of Pencilvania in seek for its dream. In this world of paper and ink, Pena has a dream unlike any other - to soar its wings through the skies. But, well... he's has no wings...

He then finds the enigmatic Wise Pencil, who with his endless wisdom, tells Pena of a legend - the Great Magic Topper - the one with the power to transform anything into a bird.

Join the Adventure


Prepare to be swept away in this extraordinary journey, where dreams take flight, and the ordinary becomes extraordinary. Your adventure awaits – will you help Pena achieve the impossible dream?

Dive into this fantastical world, and let your imagination soar as high as Pen dreams to fly! 🪶✨🖋️

This is an exploration game with a calm and cosy spirit. If you like such casual adventure satisfying games, you will like this one!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04, Ubuntu 18.04, and CentOS 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 4th generation or similar
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.2+ or Vulkan-capable, Nvidia, and AMD GPUs
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires an Apple processor
  • OS: macOS 12.4 (or newer)
  • Processor: Apple M1 Max (or similar)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Metal-capable Intel and AMD GPUs
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

short_description: Pencilvania is a game of exploration and solving secrets, where Pena - the main character - has set itself to make its dream become true: launch its own wings at the sky and fierce through the winds. But for that, you must collect feathers and bring them to the Great Magic Topper.
